title: Start
body:
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<outfit J-Pe Casual>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<expression J-Pe Angry>>
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move J-Pe StageRight2>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Aig, we need to talk.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Okay.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
It seems like you're spending all your time promoting yourself lately...
->I'm promoting US!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I'm just trying to promote us! Like, as a group!
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
    *sigh*
    Listen, a new group like us, we have to launch ourselves slowly. It's easier just to have one face out there, for now.
->Yeah?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    Yeah, so what?
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Angry>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    Ugh! Do you have any idea-
->I do what I want
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I do what I want. You're not my manager.
    <<expression J-Pe Angry>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
We're a TEAM, Aig. And being in this team means I handle this sort of thing. I'm better at it anyway.
<<name Friendship ...>>
Once again, you grab a flyer off his bunk.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Angry>>
This doesn't even say "J-Pe and the Boys" on it anymore--
which, by the way is not even the name of the group.
This is just a photo of you!
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-PE Happy>>
Aiggy, I know what I'm doing.  Trust me! Teamwork makes the dream work!
<<move J-Pe StageRight1>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe Angry>>
I don't suppose you want to end up like...HIM, do you?
<<flip J-Pe>>
Your gaze lingers briefly on the wreath and candles--the only things you have to remember the bed's previous occupant by.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
Um...no...?
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Yeah, that's what I thought.
